snippet: The advertisements depict the twin towers, engulfed in flames, beside a quote attributed to the Koran: “Soon shall we cast terror into the hearts of the unbelievers.”
abstract: American Freedom Defense Initiative, behind spate of inflammatory advertisements throughout New York City transit system, will spend $70,000 on its biggest campaign to date; group plans to place advertisements on hundreds of subway station clocks that will depict the twin towers, engulfed in flames, beside a quote attributed to the Koran.
